Type of dynamic path to be computed

Example
{
  "path-info": [
    {
      "segment-list-name": "string",
      "metric": {
        "metric-type": "string"
      },
      "enable": [ null ],
      "type": "string",
      "hop-type": "string"
    }
  ]
}

path-info_schema:

segment-list-name: string

Segment-list name

metric: object

Metric configuration, valid only for dynamic path-options

metric-type: string igp, te

Metric type

enable: null

True only

type: string explicit, dynamic

Path-option type

hop-type: string mpls, srv6

Type of dynamic path to be computed

Example
{
  "segment-list-name": "string",
  "metric": {
    "metric-type": "string"
  },
  "enable": [ null ],
  "type": "string",
  "hop-type": "string"
}

Metric type

Example
{
  "metric-type": "string"
}

segments_schema:

Segments/hops configuration for given Segment-list

segment: object[]

Configure Segment/hop at the index

object
segment-type: string ipv4-address, mpls-label

Segment/hop type

address: string

IPv4 Address

segment-index: integer

Segment index

range:"1..65535"
mpls-label: integer

MPLS Label

range:"0..1048575" default:"0"
Example
{
  "segment": [
    {
      "segment-type": "string",
      "address": "string",
      "segment-index": "integer",
      "mpls-label": "integer"
    }
  ]
}

timers_schema:

PCE Timers configuration

reoptimization-timer: integer

Topology reoptimization timer configuration

range:"10..3600" units:"second" default:"60"
minimum-peer-keepalive: integer

Minimum acceptable peer proposed keepalive interval

range:"0..255" units:"second" default:"20"
keepalive: integer

Keepalive interval in seconds, zero to disable

range:"0..255" units:"second" default:"30"
Example
{
  "reoptimization-timer": "integer",
  "minimum-peer-keepalive": "integer",
  "keepalive": "integer"
}

    ENABLE

Example

  "netconf-ssh": {
    "netconf-ssh-password": "string",
    "netconf-ssh-user": "string"
  },
  "enable": [ null ]
}

disjoint-path_schema:

Disjoint path configuration

    ENABLE
groups: object

Association configuration

group: object[]

Association Group Configuration

    ENABLE
sub-id: integer

Sub group ID, 0 to unset

range:"0..65535"
strict: null

Disable Fallback

group-lsp-records: object

lsp pcc records container with in group

group-lsp-record: object[]

LSP first/second PCC record tuple containingIpAddr, LspName, DisjPath

object
lsp-id: integer

Lsp id

range:"1..2"
ip-addr: string

IP address of PCC

disj-path: integer

Set LSP to follow shortest-path

lsp-name: string

Identifying name for LSP

group-id: integer

Group ID

range:"1..65535"
dp-type: string link, node, srlg, srlg-node

Disjointness type

Example
{
  "groups": {
    "group": [
      {
        "sub-id": "integer",
        "strict": [ null ],
        "group-lsp-records": {
          "group-lsp-record": [
            {
              "lsp-id": "integer",
              "ip-addr": "string",
              "disj-path": "integer",
              "lsp-name": "string"
            }
          ]
        },
        "group-id": "integer",
        "dp-type": "string",
        "enable": [ null ]
      }
    ]
  },
  "enable": [ null ]
}

    ENABLE

object

Hop Index

range:"1..65535"

Remote IPv4 address

address: string

IPv4 Address

mpls-label: integer

MPLS Label

range:"0..1048575" default:"0"

            "address": "string",
            "mpls-label": "integer"
          }
        ]
      },
      "enable": [ null ]

  ]
